## HeatMapTool class

热力图展示

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HeatMapTool extends ToolBase<ToolBaseOptions, HeatMapToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;ToolBaseOptions, HeatMapToolEvents&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new HeatMapTool({})

tool.enable()
tool.addHeatMap({...})
```
